### TSPS 1.2 Organizational Design and Classification Consultant

#### Solicitation Title

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) is seeking a Senior Organizational Design and Classification Consultant to provide expertise on an as-needed basis.

#### Reference and Contract Details

* Solicitation Number: 24062-23-509
* Amendment Number: 1
* Tender Closing Date: Closed on 2023-06-16T14:00:00

#### Project Overview

The Human Resources Division (HRD) of the TBS requires a senior organizational consultant with expertise in Hay Plan standards for EX classification in the federal public service. The consultant will provide critical analysis of proposed work descriptions and rationales to determine their feasibility.

#### Key Responsibilities

The selected consultant will:

* Analyze proposed work descriptions and rationales to evaluate their alignment with the Hay Plan standards
* Provide recommendations for organizational structure changes
* Collaborate with the job description writer to ensure consistency

#### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and contract, can be downloaded from the [Canada Acquisition Centre's website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

#### Contact Information

Questions and inquiries can be directed to Richard Boyling at richard.boyling@tbs-sct.gc.ca or (343) 542-9916.

**Note:** As the tender period has closed, no new requests for proposals will be accepted. The evaluation of proposals is ongoing, and successful candidates will be notified shortly. \\
